Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class SplitDataSet< T >

A specialization of DataSet which takes an split of other DataSet.

This object allows to take a subset of the output elements from a given DataSet. That is, the resulting DataSet has the same numPatterns, but lower patternSize. The output subset is an interval.
